alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Hart (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:36PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Elbert and south central Hart Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 835 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Hartwell, or 5 miles east of Bowman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberton, Russell State Park, Lake Russell, Dewy Rose, Rock Branch and Ruckersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
